suggest.dazzlesoftware/archive: To use the ExportCommand class, install dazzlesoftware/archive
suggest.dazzlesoftware/console: To use the ExportCommand and ImportCommand classes, install dazzlesoftware/console
suggest.dazzlesoftware/di: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install dazzlesoftware/di.
suggest.dazzlesoftware/filesystem: To use the ExportCommand and ImportCommand classes, install dazzlesoftware/filesystem
suggest.dazzlesoftware/registry: To use the Database ServiceProviderInterface objects, install dazzlesoftware/registry.
suggest.psr/log: To use the LoggingMonitor, install psr/log.
suggest.ext-mysqli: To connect to a MySQL database via MySQLi
suggest.ext-pdo: To connect to a MySQL, PostgreSQL, or SQLite database via PDO
suggest.ext-sqlsrv: To connect to a SQL Server database
